name: SideWorld
description:
The game is still in a very early stage of development. At the moment it's more of a tech demo than a game.

SideWorld is a colony simulator heavily inspired by Terraria and Craft the world. Gather resources, craft and try to survive every challenge that menaces your colony.

Recently added features:

  • Wheat crop
  • Grass has a chance of dropping wheat grains when harvested
  • Harvesting

Upcoming features:

  • Crafting
